Posted: January 28
Product received for free
												This simpleness of this game is what really makes it attractive.  Think racketball mixed with nitro.  The music is top notch and the sounds are very retro-chique.  Everything in the game seems to just flow really nicely and nothing seems out of place at all.  It's the perfect combo of a retro bartop arcade game, and a fast action VR game.  Basic controls and mechanics makes this really easy to pickup for 10-15 mins here or there and sweat it out a bit.  It really is a lot more work than it looks!
